lines.text: There's only one shame - failing a human being that needs you.

[to the trembling Belinda as he is about to rape her]
Your heart's poundin'. I caught a sea gull once. It had the same scared look.
Mrs. Moore is her own worst enemy.
Not while I'm alive, she isn't!
the instinct of a mother to protect her child.
It's hard to be born and it's hard to die.
He's a... something even you can't pronounce!
Probably something not fit to mention.
I have to get cash somewhere, and you and some of the others are the only ones who can afford it.
Hello, Aggie. You got back all right?
Wouldn't be here if I hadn't, would I?
Did she have a good doctor?
Don't have any. Doesn't believe in them.
Well, that's the right attitude as long as one can afford it.
